title: VA - Nova Tunes 0.1 - 1.8 (Complete Collection) 2000-2008
description:
Label: Nova Records / Wagram
Release Date: 2000-2008
Genre: Lo-Fi
Quality: MP3 VBR V2 kbps 44khz Stereo
 
Nova Tunes compilations have only one goal: to surprise your ears while exploring new music territories, putting forward a mix of different music styles embracing Electronic music, Rap, Soul, Reggae and Brazilian music. This collection was compiled with multiple obsessions: to search for diversity in the highest quality, to discover new talents and to breathe the air of Paris, New York, Berlin, London and other places...
